languages.text: "Ну ты же бросил{mf|ся|ась} спасать мою грешную душу, {name}". {n}Подобие улыбки расцветает на избитом лице.{/n} "Это меньшее, что я мог сделать для {mf|того|той}, кто до последнего пытался открыть мне глаза".

traits.locale_text: "Ну ты же бросил{mf|ся|ась} спасать мою грешную душу, {name}". {n}Подобие улыбки расцветает на избитом лице.{/n} "Это меньшее, что я мог сделать для {mf|того|той}, кто до последнего пытался открыть мне глаза".

languages.text: "Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."
languages.original_text: "Ну ты же бросил{mf|ся|ась} спасать мою грешную душу, {name}". {n}Подобие улыбки расцветает на избитом лице.{/n} "Это меньшее, что я мог сделать для {mf|того|той}, кто до последнего пытался открыть мне глаза".

traits.locale_text: "Well, you did rush in to save my miscreant soul, didn't you, {name}." {n}A feeble smile graces the beaten-up face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who tried to make me see, until the very end."

"Well, you did rush in to save my miscreant soul, didn't you, {name}." {n}A feeble smile graces the beaten-up face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who tried to make me see, until the very end."

"Well, you did rush in to save my miscreant soul, didn't you, {name}." {n}A feeble smile graces the beaten-up face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who tried to make me see, until the very end."

"Well, you did rush in to save my miscreant soul, didn't you, {name}." {n}A feeble smile graces the beaten-up face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who tried to make me see, until the very end."
"Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."
"Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."

languages.text: «Bueno, usted también acudió a toda prisa para salvar mi alma caída, ¿no es así, {name}». {n}Una débil sonrisa ilumina su rostro maltrecho.{/n} «Es lo menos que podía hacer por la persona que se ha esforzado tanto por abrirme los ojos».
languages.original_text: "Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, usted también acudió a toda prisa para salvar mi desdichada alma, ¿no es así, {name}». {n}Una débil sonrisa ilumina su rostro maltrecho.{/n} «Es lo menos que podía hacer por la persona que ha intentado abrirme los ojos hasta el final».

languages.text: “呵，你之前不是也冲过来，想要拯救我堕落的灵魂吗，{name}？”{n}他那张憔悴不堪的脸上露出了虚弱的微笑。{/n}“你那么热切地想让我看清真相，我至少得还你这个人情才行。”
languages.original_text: "Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."

traits.locale_text: “呵，你之前不是也冲过来，想要拯救我的邪恶灵魂吗，{name}？”{n}他那张饱经风霜的脸上露出了虚弱的微笑。{/n}“你想让我看清真相。至少在这最后一刻，我得为你做件最基本的事情。”

languages.text: « Ma foi, vous vous êtes bien {mf|précipité|précipitée} pour sauver ma pauvre âme déchue, {name}, {n}répond-il alors qu'un sourire faible se dessine sur son visage tuméfié.{/n} C'est le moins que je pouvais faire pour {mf|celui|celle} qui a tenté jusqu'au bout de m'ouvrir les yeux. »
languages.original_text: "Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi, vous vous êtes bien {mf|précipité|précipitée} pour sauver ma pauvre âme de mécréant, {name}, {n}répond-il avec un sourire faible sur son visage tuméfié.{/n} C'est le moins que je pouvais faire pour {mf|celui|celle} qui a tenté jusqu'au bout de m'ouvrir les yeux. »

languages.text: 「では、お前は俺の堕ちた魂を救うために駆けつけたというわけか、{name}」{n}弱々しい笑みが、打ちひしがれた顔に浮かぶ。{/n}「根気強く俺のことを気にかけてくれた相手に、俺ができるのはそれくらいだ」
languages.original_text: "Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."

traits.locale_text: 「では、お前は俺の堕ちた魂を救うために駆けつけたというわけか、{name}」{n}弱々しい笑みが、打ちひしがれた顔に浮かぶ。{/n}「根気強く俺のことを気にかけてくれた相手に、俺ができるのはそれくらいだ」

languages.text: "Nun, Ihr seid in der Tat losgestürmt, um meine gefallene Seele zu retten, nicht wahr, {name}?." {n}Auf seinem geschundenen Gesicht macht sich ein schwaches Lächeln breit.{/n} "Das ist das Mindeste, was ich für jemanden tun kann, der so leidenschaftlich versucht hat, mir die Augen zu öffnen."
languages.original_text: "Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Ihr seid in der Tat losgestürmt, um meine verkommene Seele zu retten, nicht wahr, {name}." {n}Ein schwaches Grinsen ziert das verprügelte Gesicht.{/n} "Das ist das Mindeste, was ich für jemanden tun kann, der bis zum bitteren Ende versucht hat, mir die Augen zu öffnen."

languages.text: "Sen de benim günahkâr ruhumu kurtarmak için acele etmemiş miydin {name}?" {n}Hırpalanmış yüzünde zayıf bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Gözümü gerçeklere açmak uğruna böylesine gayret gösteren biri için elimden ne geliyorsa yaptım."
languages.original_text: "Well, you did rush in to save my fallen soul, didn't you, {name}?" {n}A feeble smile appears on his battered face.{/n} "It's the least I could do for the one who so arduously tried to make me see."
